title: Sail Aboard the Only America's Cup Yacht in the Bay Area with Four seasons hotel san franciscoTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Sail aboard on America’s Cup Yacht in the Bay area with Four seasons hotel San francisco Published on : Friday, July 17, 2015
Four Seasons Hotel San Francisco is centrally located in downtown San Francisco, minutes from the spectacular scenery of the Bay. Be one of the few in the world to experience an adventurous sailing on the Bay aboard an America’s Cup yacht, while enjoying luxurious suite accommodations at the Hotel with the Suite Hotel California package.
After a day on the water, retire to the Hotel’s spacious residential-style suites, which have floor-to-ceiling windows offering spectacular city views of SoMA, AT&T Park and Yerba Buena Gardens. Four Seasons has paired renowned Five-Star service with complimentary value-added amenities including premium wi-fi access, parking, unlimited in-room entertainment and dry cleaning up to USD 50 per suite, per day.
In 2013, San Francisco was host to the 34th America’s Cup and the USA 76 was used by ORACLE Team USA in their preparations for the 2003 America’s Cup. Become a part of that history and enjoy a thrilling 2.5 hour adventure on the USA 76 with AC Sailing. Help with the “hoist,” take a turn as a “grinder” on the powerful sail trim controls, be the skipper of an America’s Cup team and take a turn at the helm of this high-speed yacht. Or revel in the views of the San Francisco skyline, Alcatraz and both the Bay and Golden Gate Bridges.
Available starting September 1, 2015, guests can reserve the package online or by calling the Hotel at 415 633 3000.
The AC Sailing voyage with Four Seasons Hotel San Francisco is part of Suite Hotel California Coastal Tour with Four Seasons California Collection, the brand’s seven luxurious properties situated across famed locations in the Golden State. Each hotel, resort or residences is bringing guests the ultimate road-trip featuring exclusive, local activities that highlight the best of California’s destinations where Four Seasons calls home.
Whether starting at the top in the City by the Bay or venturing north from sunny San Diego, the tour is designed for travellers to explore one or all of the properties. Guests looking for the full coastal adventure can get a little help from the “California Coastal Concierge,” who can reserve all of the Suite Hotel California experiences, as well as arrange car transportation for guests who want to drive themselves or have a chauffeured tour.
Source:-Four Seasons
